Description: When the total value of the current Dormitory is under <color=#FF4E4EFF>1200</color> points, both Constructs' Stamina and Mood will decrease by <color=#28CFFFFF>1</color> point per hour.
When the total value of the current Dormitory reaches <color=#FF4E4EFF>1200</color> points, Constructs will restore <color=#28CFFFFF>3</color> Stamina and <color=#28CFFFFF>0.5</color> Mood per hour.
When the total value of the current Dormitory reaches <color=#FF4E4EFF>3500</color> points, Constructs will restore <color=#28CFFFFF>4</color> Stamina and <color=#28CFFFFF>1</color> Mood per hour.

When the Comfort and Utility of the current Dormitory reach <color=#FF4E4EFF>3500</color> points and <color=#FF4E4EFF>2000</color> points respectively, Constructs will restore <color=#28CFFFFF>5</color> Stamina and <color=#28CFFFFF>2</color> Mood per hour.

When the Comfort and Utility of the current Dormitory reach <color=#FF4E4EFF>6500</color> points and <color=#FF4E4EFF>3500</color> points respectively, Constructs will restore <color=#28CFFFFF>6</color> Stamina and <color=#28CFFFFF>5</color> Mood per hour.

When the Beauty and Comfort of the current Dormitory reach <color=#FF4E4EFF>6500</color> points and <color=#FF4E4EFF>3500</color> points respectively, Constructs will restore <color=#28CFFFFF>6</color> Stamina and <color=#28CFFFFF>5</color> Mood per hour.
